title: Product Calculator
code:
§begin multiply_all
  factors ← [2, 3, 4]
  product ← 1
  §iterate factor §in factors
    product ← product ⊕ factor
  §end_iterate
  §transmit product
§end
solution_description: calculates the sum by starting with 1 and adding each factor
hints: Each factor is added to product
The final result is 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 = 10... wait, that's not right. Let me check the output.
